message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product at a price of $20,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value. Let me know what you think.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I've done some research and I think that's a fair price considering the market value.
Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your perspective, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $18,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $18,000 is still out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $14,000. That's the highest I'm willing to go.
